page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: USK AND RURAL AREA - WORK A large area of the block is rural, with family run farms. Most other people work either in Usk at the Detention Centre, Agricultural College, shops, offices and business- es, or travel further to work in factories at Glascoed (Ordance Factory), Pontypool (I.C.I., Parke Davis), Newport (Llanwern Steelworks). In Llancayo lives a postman, agricultural engineer, railway worker, stores manager, carpenter, construction engineer, plant operator, teacher and farmer. This area has unemployed adult workers, but not in large numbers, and, relatively speaking, the recession has not affected the young school leavers in this area.
